sentences.en: He cancelled the trip to his California ranch and prepared for the state funeral.
sentences.cn: 他取消了去加利福尼亚大农场的旅行,并筹备国葬事宜.

sentences.en: He enjoyed life on the ranch.
sentences.cn: 他在牧场日子过得很痛快.

sentences.en: He left his Montana ranch to his spinster sister.
sentences.cn: 他把他在蒙大拿州的大牧场留给了他未婚的妹妹.

sentences.en: He lives on a cattle ranch in Texas.
sentences.cn: 他住在德克萨斯州的一个养牛的大牧场里。

sentences.en: I don't care for a ranch type.
I thought your father's ranch was hundreds of miles from here.
sentences.cn: 我想从这里开始,几百英里内都是你爸爸的农场.

sentences.en: I'm going down to the post - office and then pull out for the ranch.
sentences.cn: 我想到邮政局去,然后动身回农庄.

sentences.en: It's about 50 kilometers from here to my ranch.
sentences.cn: 从这儿到我的牧场约有50公里.

sentences.en: Meanwhile , as spring advanced, the flowers in the seed ranch began to come to life.
sentences.cn: 春深了, 苗圃里的花草又苏醒过来了.

sentences.en: Served with marinara sauce, Southwestern Ranch dressing and sour cream.
sentences.cn: 另配意大利番茄酱, 墨西哥餐点牧场调料和酸奶油.

sentences.en: The flowers of the seed ranch grew still more.
sentences.cn: 苗圃里花草长得更盛了.

sentences.en: The monotony of the ranch eat into her heart hour by hour , year by year.
sentences.cn: 单调的农庄生活一天天 、 一年年的咬啮着她的心.

sentences.en: The ranch castrated three - fourths of its male calves.
sentences.cn: 牧场把 四分之三 的小公牛都阉割了.

sentences.en: The Rubber Rose Ranch has been officially deeded over to the cowgirls.
sentences.cn: 橡胶玫瑰农场已经被正式转交给了牛仔妹们.

sentences.en: They had to buy everything at inflated prices at the ranch store.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不在农场商店以高价购买所有东西。

sentences.en: Welcome to Emma's Ranch for housework escapees!
sentences.cn: 欢迎来到艾玛的解脱家事的农场!

words.tran_cn: 大农场经营者；大农场工人

phrases.tran_cn: 度假牧场；观光牧场或农场

trans.tran_cn: 大牧场，大农场，牧场工作人员
trans.tran_en: a very large farm in the western US and Canada where sheep, cattle, or horses are bred
